items.title: Connect your wallet
items.desc: Click on the connect button and connect your XUMM/Xaman wallet to the platform

items.title: Buy a Meme-FT
items.desc: Browse through the collection and buy the meme-FT of your choice

items.title: Auction your Meme-FT
items.desc: Display your hand-crafted meme-FTs in the marketplace and auction them off
